data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Volynkin, Anton V. (2018): A new species of the genus Barsura Volynkin, Dubatolov & Kishida from China (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae). Zootaxa 4399 (4): 596-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4399.4.11|2 occurrences
